author: cnbc.com
title: Conduent to Report Fourth-Quarter 2017 Financial Results on February 21, 2018
text:
FLORHAM PARK, N.J., Feb. 5, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Conduent Incorporated (NYSE: CNDT) plans to report its fourth-quarter and full year 2017 financial results on Wednesday, February 21, 2018. Management will present the results during a conference call and webcast at 10:00 a.m. ET.
The call will be available by live audio webcast along with the news release and online presentation slides at https://investor.conduent.com/ .
The conference call will also be available by calling 877-883-0383 (international dial-in 412-902-6506) at approximately 9:45 a.m. ET. Please ask to be joined into the Conduent call.
A recording of the conference call will be available by calling 877-344-7529, or 412-317-0088 one hour after the conference call concludes on February 21, 2018. The replay ID is 10116693.
For international calls, please select a dial-in number from:
https://services.choruscall.com/ccforms/replay.html
The telephone recording will be available until 11:59 p.m. on February 28, 2018.
We look forward to your participation.
About Conduent
Conduent is the world's largest provider of diversified business process services with leading capabilities in transaction processing, automation and analytics. The company's global workforce is dedicated to helping its large and diverse client base deliver quality services to the people they serve. These clients include 76 of the Fortune 100 companies and over 500 government entities.
Conduent's differentiated offerings touch millions of lives every day, including two-thirds of all insured patients in the U.S. and nearly nine million people who travel through toll systems daily. Whether it's digital payments, claims processing, benefit administration, automated tolling, customer care or distributed learning â€“ Conduent manages and modernizes these interactions to create value for both its clients and their constituents. Learn more at www.conduent.com .
